response.overview: The "Ridley Scott Creating Worlds" is a documentary-style extra found on the Kingdom of Heaven DVD/Blu-ray, with the most comprehensive versions being the Ultimate Edition releases which feature multiple hours of bonus content. These editions include all three versions of the film (theatrical, director's, and roadshow director's cut) along with featurettes, galleries, storyboards, and multiple audio commentaries.
response.title: Ridley Scott Creating Worlds
